data.name: GoNNER - BLÜEBERRY Edition
data.detailed_description:
BlüEBERRY EDiTiON adds new content to GoNNER

Out of the blüe, we’ve updated our first IGF award-winning game! GoNNER BlüEBERRY EdiTION adds new weapons, heads, enemy types, a new challenge, some sweet, sweet, new visuals. And yes, there are also blüeberries.

  • New head! Attack enemies from below!
  • New weapon! Spikes and skull explosions. Aw yeah!
  • New world! Fishes and blueberries!
  • A bunch of fine-tunings and stuff!
  • Some neat new visuals!

Hop back into GoNNER if it’s been a while! And if you lose your head, it’s cool—we have plenty more where that came from.

data.supported_languages: English, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Swedish, French, Dutch, Norwegian, Portuguese, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Polish, Japanese, Korean

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Controller recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Controller recommended

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 Snow Leopard
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Additional Notes: Controller recommended
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.12 Sierra (or above)
  • Processor: Quad Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Additional Notes: Controller recommended

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS or similar
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Controller recommended
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: SteamOS or similar
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Controller recommended
